name: Untitled Sapling Game
description:
MrBeast is trapped in the rainforest whilst trying to plant trees! Please help him avoid the flames by jumping upwards and to collect 5 beastcoins that turns into a sapling for future #TeamTrees in this platform game!

This game is an entry for the Warmest Game Jam, where we will try to collect as much as possible donations for the Warmste Week! Please enjoy this game and make  a small donation for TEJO!

The theme for this game jam was "a good cause". We started off making a game to raise awareness for the amazon rainforest fires but then the same night that we started, an online campaign started with #TeamTrees to plant 20million trees by 2020 and the maker of that campaign was mr beast so we made him the protagonist of the game jumping around for coins to plant tree's
